title: GBD protocol
sitename: The Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation
cleaned_text: protocol for the Global Burden of Diseases, Injuries, and Risk Factors Study (GBD) outlines the key components of the study, including the roles and responsibilities of participating individuals, the decision-making processes, and the deliverables.
